meta.title: Operation of Semi Automatic Capsule Filling Machine

sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Semi-Automatic Capsule Filling Machine.
sections.scope: Applicable to capsule filling activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify cleanliness and assembly of loading, filling, and closing stations.
Load empty capsules into the hopper and verify proper orientation.
Separate capsules into caps and bodies using vacuum station.
Position the body tray under the powder filling station.
Set the powder filling time or speed to achieve target weight.
Perform weight checks and adjust fill settings if necessary.
Join the caps and bodies at the closing station.
Eject the finished capsules and inspect for integrity.
Clean all stations and product contact parts after the run.
Document fill weights and yield in the batch record.
precautions: Maintain proper vacuum levels for consistent capsule separation.
Check fill weights frequently to ensure dose uniformity.
Avoid powder buildup in the closing station to prevent breakage.
Ensure capsules are within shelf-life and not brittle.
Follow validated cleaning procedures between different products.
